statements: SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_name, key_description FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 1;
SELECT key_id, key_name, key_value, key_description FROM encryption_keys WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT key_id, key_name FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_id DESC;
SELECT key_name, key_description FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name LIKE '%secret%';
SELECT key_id, key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY key_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND key_value LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT key_description, created_at FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name = 'Master Key' OR key_value = 'Secret Key' ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_description LIKE '%important%' OR key_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY key_name, key_id DESC;
SELECT key_id, key_name, key_description, created_at FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name = 'Backup Key' AND key_value != '123456' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_name, key_value, id FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT amount, timestamp, transaction_id FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, encrypted_data FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name LIKE '%secret%' ORDER BY key_name;
SELECT transaction_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY transaction_id HAVING total_amount > 500;
SELECT transaction_id, encrypted_data FROM transactions WHERE LENGTH(encrypted_data) > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT id, encryption_key FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, secure_question, secure_answer FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, secure_question, secure_answer FROM users WHERE secure_answer IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, sender_account, receiver_account FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, log_message FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_message LIKE '%error%';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name = 'main_key';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_name DESC;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE id > 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE sender_account = 1001;
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, log_message, timestamp FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT log_id, log_message FROM logs WHERE log_message LIKE '%error%' AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM user_transactions WHERE transaction_id IN (SELECT transaction_id FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000));
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE key_id = 'd56d07aa-7a1c-4cc4-baf4-4c67345345d6' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT key_id, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM transactions GROUP BY key_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;

SELECT users.username, SUM(transactions.amount) AS total_amount FROM users JOIN user_transactions ON users.user_id = user_transactions.user_id JOIN transactions ON transactions.transaction_id = user_transactions.transaction_id GROUP BY users.username ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
